QuestData.Title: The End of the Beginning
QuestData.Description:
<Renathal struggles to speak, his wounds evident.>
I knew Denathrius had hoarded anima, but this... this is beyond imagining.
The Jailer will surely use this power to shatter his bonds. Should he break free of the Maw, all the realms of Death will fall.
We must continue to press the fight against Denathrius. Alas, we cannot hope to succeed alone.
Return to Oribos with Draven and speak to the Honored Voice, Tal-Inara. Tell her what you have seen this day and implore her to action.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Voice of the Arbiter, Tal-Inara, in Oribos.
QuestData.RewardText: We have sensed something horrific has happened. Quickly, tell me everything.

Objectives.Objective: Fly with Draven to the Flightmaster
